ministry: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
description: Urban renewal mission aimed at developing 100 cities through area-based retrofitting, redevelopment, and pan-city solutions to enhance quality of life and provide sustainable urban environment.

other_conditions: Cities selected through competition based on Smart City Proposals
Each State shortlists smart city aspirants
Emphasis on citizen participation in planning
Fellows appointed must be below 35 years of age with minimum 60% marks from premier institutions

benefits: Area-based development: Retrofitting and redevelopment of city sectors
Heritage conservation and beautification (e.g., Ujjain ghats and temples)
Smart water management with SCADA systems
Public Wi-Fi zones in tourist areas

steps: City prepares Smart City Proposal with citizen participation
Tenders invited for smart roads, ICCCs, IT solutions
Smart Cities Fellows (under 35 years) appointed for project support
